line.text:
Planned Work
[3] Harlem-bound trains make local stops at Franklin, Canal, Houston, Christopher, 18, 23, and 28 Sts

Late Nights, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23

• Please allow additional travel time.

Note: [3] service is extended to/from New Lots Av during this time.

Planned Work
[6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains run express from Parkchester to Hunts Point Av

Weekends, 6:45 AM Sat to 7 PM Sun, until Mar 1

For service to St Lawrence Av, Morrison Av-Soundview, Elder and Whitlock Avs,
take the [6] to Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a
Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].




Planned Work
[5] No trains between Grand Central-42 St and Bowling Green

[4] [6] and [R] trains provide alternate service
Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Feb 21 - 22

[5] service operates every 20 minutes between Dyre Av and Grand Central-42 St.
• Downtown trains make local stops from 125 St to Grand Central-42 St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]


For 14 St-Union Sq and Brooklyn Bridge, take the [4] [6].

For Fulton St, Wall St and Bowling Green, use nearby [R] stations at
Cortlandt St, Rector St and Whitehall St.

• Transfer between [5] and [R] trains at 59 St.
• Transfer between [5] and [4] [6] trains at Grand Central-42 St.
• Transfer between [4] [6] and [R] trains at Canal St.

Note: No [4] service between Brooklyn Bridge and New Lots Av.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[4] No trains between Brooklyn Bridge and New Lots Av
[2] [3] [D] [N] [Q] [R] trains provide alternate service

Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23 • Feb 27 - Mar 2

[4] service operates between Woodlawn and Brooklyn Bridge, making local stops.

Late Night [3] service is extended to New Lots Av.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [D] or [Q].

For Lower Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn, take the [2] [3] or [N] [R].

For service between Borough Hall and Franklin Av, take the [2] [3].
Take the [3] between Franklin Av and New Lots Av.

[4] StationNearby [R] Station Nearby [2] [3] Station
Brooklyn Bridge    City HallPark Place
Fulton St [ad] Cortlandt St [ad] Fulton St [ad]
Wall StRector StWall St
Bowling Green [ad]Whitehall St-South Ferry [1]  —
Borough HallCourt St or
Jay St-MetroTech [ad] [A] [C] [F] 		Borough Hall [ad]
Nevins StDeKalb Av [ad] [Q]Nevins St

Key Transfer Stations
Bleecker St/B'way-Lafayette St [ad][4] and [D] [F]
14 St-Union Sq [ad] or Canal St[4] and [N] [Q] [R]
Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [ad][4] and [2] [3] [D] [N] [Q] [R]

Note: No Weekend [5] service between Grand Central-42 St and Bowling Green.

Reminder: Late Night Service at these [R] stations is provided by the [N].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[E] Jamaica Center-bound trains run local from Roosevelt Av to 71 Av

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Feb 21 - 23

Trains stop at Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[E] Jamaica Center-bound trains skip Spring St and 23 St

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23

For service to these stations, take the [E] to W 4 St or 34 St and transfer to a
downtown [A] local, [C] or [E].

For service from these stations, take the [A] [C] or [E] to 14 St or Canal St
and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E].




Planned Work
[C] 168 St-bound trains run via the [F] from Jay St-MetroTech to 34 St-Herald Sq,
then via the [D] to 59 St-Columbus Circle

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Feb 21 - 22

No 168 St-bound service at High, Fulton, Chambers, Canal, Spring, 14, 23, 34, 42 and 50 Sts.

Travel Alternatives

For High, Fulton, Chambers, Canal 14, 34, and 42 Sts, take the [A] via transfer at
Jay St-MetroTech or 59 St-Columbus Circle.

For service to Spring St, take the [C] to W 4 St and transfer to a downtown [C] or [E].

For service from this station*, take the [C] or [E] to Canal St and transfer to an uptown [A]
to 59 St-Columbus Circle where [C] service is available.

For service to 23 St, take the [C] to the 7 Av [D] [E] Station and transfer to a downtown [E].

For service from this station*, take the [C] or [E] to 14 St and transfer to an uptown [A]
to 59 St where [C] service is available.

For 50 St, take the [E]. Transfer between trains at W 4 St or 7 Av.

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

Alternate travel note:
For 14, 23, 34, 42 and 50 Sts, use nearby [F] stations on 6 Av instead.




Planned Work
[A] No trains between Rockaway Blvd and Lefferts Blvd
[A] Howard Beach/Far Rockaway-bound trains skip 88 St

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23

[A] service operates between 207 St and Howard Beach-JFK Airport/Mott Av.

[SB] buses make all stops between 80 St and Lefferts Blvd.

• Transfer between trains and buses at 80 St.

Show Shuttle Bus Stops
StationShuttle Bus Stop
80 St [A]Liberty Av at 80 St
88 St [A] (Inwood-bound only)Liberty Av at 88 St
Rockaway Blvd
          [A] (Inwood-bound only)		93 St at Liberty Av (to Lefferts Blvd)
Liberty Av at 93 St (to 80 St)
104 StLiberty Av at 104 St
111 StLiberty Av at 111 St
Lefferts BlvdLefferts Blvd at Liberty Av

Note: The Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound platform at Rockaway Blvd is closed for renovation.

Alternate travel note:
For service to 88 St and Rockaway Blvd, take the [A] to Aqueduct-North Conduit Av
and transfer to an Inwood-bound [A].
For service toward the Rockaways from these stations, take the [A] to 80 St
and transfer to a Howard Beach/Far Rockaway-bound [A].

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains run local from Roosevelt Av to 71 Av

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Feb 21 - 23

Trains stop at Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Smith-9 Sts to Avenue X

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 8 PM Sun, Feb 20 - 22

No Coney Island-bound service at 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park, Fort Hamilton Pkwy,
Ditmas Av, Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P and Avenue U.

Travel Alternatives

For 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, take the [G] instead.
Transfer between trains at Smith-9 Sts, 7 Av or Church Av.

For service to Ditmas Av, Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P and Avenue U,
take the [F] to 18 Av, Kings Hwy or Avenue X and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from these stations, take the [F] to Kings Hwy, 18 Av or Church Av
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

line.name: L
line.text:
Planned Work
[L] No trains between 14 St-Union Sq and 8 Av

M14 buses provide alternate service
Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Feb 23

[L] service operates between Rockaway Pkwy and 14 St-Union Sq.

M14 buses make all [L] stops between 14 St-Union Sq and 8 Av.

• Transfer between [L] trains and M14 buses at 14 St-Union Sq.
• Use transfer ticket for connections between M14 buses and [A] [C] trains
at 8 Av-14 St or [F] trains at 6 Av-14 St.

Note: Additional overnight M14 bus service will be provided between 8 Av and 1 Av.

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:41AM

Due to a train with mechanical problems at 49 St, southbound [Q] trains are running with delays.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from 71 Av to Queens Plaza

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Feb 21 - 22

Trains stop at Roosevelt Av.

For service to 67 Av, 63 Dr, Woodhaven Blvd, Grand and Elmhurst Avs, take the [R] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E], Jamaica-bound [F]* or Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service to 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46, Steinway and 36 Sts, take the [R] to Queens Plaza
and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] local or Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [E] [F]* or [R] to Roosevelt Av or 71 Av
and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

~ For late night travel at these stations, see [E] advisories.




Planned Work
[Q] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy

Weekend, 11:15 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23

Trains stop at Church Av and Newkirk Plaza.

For service to Parkside Av, Beverley, Cortelyou Rds, Avenue H, Avenue J and Avenue M,
take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza or Kings Hwy and transfer to a 57 St/7 Av-bound [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [Q] to Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Allow additional travel time.

8 AM to 5 PM, Sunday, Feb 22

Due to the Chinese New Year Parade, buses run via 9 Av making corresponding stops in both directions.

Northbound
Via 8 Av
Right on 60 St
Left on 9 Av
Left on 39 St then regular route

Southbound
Via 39 St
Right on 9 Av
Right on 60 St
Left on 8 Av then regular route

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses operate as follows:

Via Broadway
Right on Roebling St into Washington Plaza.




Planned Detour
B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway
Junction due to construction - No stops missed

Until further notice

Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av
Into Fulton St
Right on Eastern Pkwy
Left on Broadway then regular route


Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

8 AM to 5 PM, Sunday, Feb 22

Due to the Chinese New Year Parade, buses run via 46 St making corresponding stops.

Show Reroute Details

Left on 7 Av
Right on 46 St
Right on 9 Av
Left on 50 St then regular route

There is no Sunday BM1, BM2, BM3, BM4 and BM5 bus service.

Delays  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:08AM

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:10AM

M60-SBS, M100, M101 and Bx15 buses are detoured in both directions due to FDNY activity on 125 St between Lenox Av and 5 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 125 St, to Malcolm X Blvd, right on Malcolm X Blvd to 116 St, left on 116 St to Madison Av, left on Madison Av to 125 St, right on 125 St and regular route.

125 St and Malcolm X Blvd stop will be made on Malcolm X Blvd and 125 St at the M7 bus stop.

125 St and 5 Av bus stop will NOT be made. Customers may use 125 St and Madison Av instead.

Westbound: Via 125 St to 5 Av left on 5 Av to 116 St, right on 116 St to Malcolm X Blvd, right on Malcolm X Blvd to 125 St, left on 125 St, and regular route.

125 St and 5 Av bus stop will be made on 5 Av and 125 St at the M1 bus stop.

Allow additional travel time.   

 



Delays  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:06AM

Due to inclement weather, all Bronx Local and Express buses are running with delays.

Allow additional travel time.

line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:10AM

M60-SBS, M100, M101 and Bx15 buses are detoured in both directions due to FDNY activity on 125 St between Lenox Av and 5 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 125 St, to Malcolm X Blvd, right on Malcolm X Blvd to 116 St, left on 116 St to Madison Av, left on Madison Av to 125 St, right on 125 St and regular route.

125 St and Malcolm X Blvd stop will be made on Malcolm X Blvd and 125 St at the M7 bus stop.

125 St and 5 Av bus stop will NOT be made. Customers may use 125 St and Madison Av instead.

Westbound: Via 125 St to 5 Av left on 5 Av to 116 St, right on 116 St to Malcolm X Blvd, right on Malcolm X Blvd to 125 St, left on 125 St, and regular route.

125 St and 5 Av bus stop will be made on 5 Av and 125 St at the M1 bus stop.

Allow additional travel time.   

 



Delays  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:08AM

M15 and M15 SBS buses are running with delays, due to crane operation on 51 St and 2 Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M50 - Westbound buses rerouted from 49 St between 10 Av and 11 Av - No stops missed

8 AM to 6 PM, Sat and Sun, Feb 21 - 22

Due to a crane operation, buses may experience delays.

Show Reroute Details
Via 49 St
Right on 10 Av
Left on 51 St
Left on 11 Av
Right on 49 then regular route

Left on 125 St
Right on Frederick Douglass Blvd

Left on Manhattan Av then regular route

Until further notice

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to nearby temporary stop.

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 02/22/2015  8:23AM

The 7:12AM train from Penn due Ronkonkoma at 8:32AM is operating 11 minutes late due to a late-arriving westbound train in single-track territory.

Delays  Posted: 02/22/2015  7:52AM

The 7:40AM train from Ronkonkoma due Penn at 8:59AM is operating 11 minutes late due to congestion at Ronkonkoma caused by earlier fire department activity.
